_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.

The disciplinary issue of different type: Take some other monk who is a frequent offender with many offenses
Take some other monk who is an occasional offender without many offenses and dodges the issue
Take some other monk who is an occasional offender without many offenses and doesn't dodge the issue
Take some other monk who gets by with mere faith and love
The cause and reason for more training r: Sentient beings are in decline and the true teaching is disappearing
Defiling influences appear in the Saṅgha
The Saṅgha has attained a great size, an abundance of material support and fame, learning, and seniority
